content: my little anna has discovered the color monster a book of feelings in school few days ago she is in love with it and couldn t stop talk about the colors of emotion so i decide to make these baby octopus for her to create and enjoy more stories about this topic it will take you less than 1 hour to finish one octopus you can use it as a keychain a little friendly octopus on your desk or create them in all colors of emotion as mine red angry yellow happy green calm blue sad grey scared and pink love let s make this super fun and easy project and share with me with hashtag #khuccay #lespetitesmainsdekhuccay or add a ravelry project happy crocheting ♥ materials yarn depends on your choice i used dk weight yarn 140m/50gr with different colors black thread hook size 2 5 mm two 7mm safety eyes stuffing polyfill cotton wool etc needle for sewing scissors pins pink blush for the cheeks
